ml:doc-envelope.ml:original-txt:
ï»¿I OFFICIAL I TAENTS RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Sixth Economic Growth and Governance Development Policy Financing to the Republic of Togo The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the Republic of Togo a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 9,200,000. The purpose of said credit is to continue to support reforms to improve transparency and oversight in public financial management, and efficiency and competitiveness in key sectors of the economy. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the program in support of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Togo and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Togo.
ï»¿Republic of Togo -2- 6th Economic Recovery and Governance DPF 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said program for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Nominee Selected by Governor for Republic of Togo A.cting Regional Vice President Africa Region ice President, Concessional Finance and Global Partnerships Senior Vice Presiden , Development Economics and Chief Economist ated at Washington, D.C. N64 alld.C. ~~I
